questions.question: What best describes your body frame?

options.text: Thin, light, tall or short, difficulty gaining weight
Medium build, well-proportioned, athletic
Large, solid frame, gains weight easily, strong

questions.question: How would you describe your skin?

options.text: Dry, rough, thin, cool to touch, prone to cracking
Warm, slightly oily, sensitive, prone to rashes/acne
Thick, smooth, oily, cool, soft
Dry, thin, frizzy, prone to breakage and split ends
Fine, straight, oily, prone to early graying or hair loss
Thick, wavy, lustrous, strong

questions.question: How would you describe your appetite?

options.text: Variable, sometimes strong, sometimes weak, forget to eat
Strong, cannot skip meals, get irritable when hungry
Steady but slow, can easily skip meals without discomfort
Irregular, bloating, gas, constipation common
Strong, quick digestion, occasional acidity or loose stools
Slow but steady, heavy feeling after meals, mucus in stool
Light, interrupted, difficulty falling asleep, wake up easily
Moderate, sound sleep but not too long, wake up alert
Deep, heavy, prolonged, difficulty waking up

questions.question: How do you respond to temperature?

options.text: Often feel cold, prefer warm climates, cold hands and feet
Often feel warm, dislike heat, sweat easily
Adaptable to temperature, tolerate extremes well

questions.question: How would you describe your mental activity?

options.text: Quick, restless mind, creative but scattered, many ideas
Sharp, focused, analytical, goal-oriented
Calm, steady, methodical, good long-term memory

questions.question: How do you typically respond to stress?

options.text: Become anxious, worried, fearful, overthinking
Become irritable, angry, critical, impatient
Become withdrawn, stubborn, resistant to change

questions.question: How would you describe your speech?

options.text: Fast, talkative, may jump between topics
Clear, precise, argumentative, convincing
Slow, deliberate, melodious, thoughtful
Learn quickly but forget quickly, need to repeat
Moderate pace, good focus, remember well
Slow to learn but excellent retention, never forget

questions.question: What is your approach to physical activity?

options.text: Active but tire quickly, prefer low-impact activities
Competitive, enjoy challenging sports, moderate endurance
Prefer slow, steady activities, excellent stamina once started
Spend impulsively, difficulty saving, money comes and goes
Spend on quality items, organized finances, calculated purchases
Save money, accumulate wealth, reluctant to spend
Irregular, dry, hard stools, tendency to constipation
Regular, 2-3 times daily, loose or burning sensation
Regular, once daily, heavy, may have mucus
Minimal sweating, dry skin even in heat
Profuse sweating, strong body odor
Moderate sweating, pleasant or no body odor

vata_dominant.description: You have a Vata-dominant constitution. Vata governs movement and is composed of air and ether elements. You are creative, quick-thinking, and enthusiastic but may experience anxiety, dryness, and irregular habits when imbalanced.
recommendations: Follow a regular daily routine for meals and sleep
Favor warm, cooked, oily foods
Include sweet, sour, and salty tastes
Stay warm and avoid cold, dry environments
Practice calming activities like yoga and meditation
Use sesame oil for self-massage (Abhyanga)

pitta_dominant.description: You have a Pitta-dominant constitution. Pitta governs transformation and is composed of fire and water elements. You are sharp, focused, and natural leaders but may experience anger, inflammation, and acidity when imbalanced.
recommendations: Avoid excessive heat and direct sun exposure
Favor cool, refreshing foods
Include sweet, bitter, and astringent tastes
Avoid spicy, sour, and salty foods
Practice moderation in work and exercise
Engage in cooling activities like swimming

kapha_dominant.description: You have a Kapha-dominant constitution. Kapha governs structure and is composed of earth and water elements. You are calm, loving, and strong but may experience weight gain, lethargy, and attachment when imbalanced.
recommendations: Stay physically active with regular exercise
Favor light, warm, stimulating foods
Include pungent, bitter, and astringent tastes
Avoid heavy, oily, and cold foods
Wake up early and avoid daytime sleeping
Seek new experiences and challenges

vata_pitta.description: You have a Vata-Pitta dual constitution. You share qualities of both doshas - creative and sharp-minded, but may experience both anxiety and irritability when imbalanced.
recommendations: Maintain routine while allowing flexibility
Favor warm but not overly spicy foods
Include sweet and cooling foods
Balance activity with adequate rest
Practice both grounding and cooling practices

pitta_kapha.description: You have a Pitta-Kapha dual constitution. You combine strength and determination with stability, but may experience both heat-related and congestion issues when imbalanced.
recommendations: Favor light, cooling foods
Include bitter and astringent tastes
Maintain regular exercise routine
Avoid heavy, oily, and very spicy foods
Balance ambition with contentment

vata_kapha.description: You have a Vata-Kapha dual constitution. You may alternate between lightness and heaviness, activity and inertia. Both doshas are cold, so staying warm is important.
recommendations: Favor warm, light, stimulating foods
Include pungent and sour tastes moderately
Maintain regular routine with variety
Stay warm and active
Use warming spices like ginger

tridosha.description: You have a balanced Tridosha constitution, which is rare. All three doshas are relatively equal. Focus on maintaining this balance through seasonal adjustments.
recommendations: Adjust diet according to seasons
Maintain moderate lifestyle in all aspects
Pay attention to early signs of imbalance
All tastes in moderation
Flexible approach to diet and lifestyle
